The user, while using [[Six Paths Senjutsu]], launches [[Truth-Seeking Ball]]s around them into the ground, creating a dark-coloured shockwave, which induces [[Tenpenchii]] around them in the process, with the calamities including flames and purple-coloured electricity.

[[pt-br:Seis Caminhos: Lanterna Transversal]]
[[pl:Rikudō: Jūji Hōka]]
